content.rendered:
F . A . Q

KNOWLEDGE BASE

Search our articles or browse by category below

1. How can I participate?

To participate, you simply have to open an account with us from the official website and make a minimum deposit of $100.

2. What mode of payment are acceptable?

These can be done directly in BTCs by sending the desired amount to the designated wallet address that appears when you carry out the process.

3. Is this legit or one of those scam projects out there?

Unfortunately, it’s true that with the cryptocurrency boom, more scams are emerging. The difference between a scam and a real project is the information offered, the generation of value and proven facts embedded in our legal registration documents. Our system generates daily returns and so that there can be no doubts, it is distributed every day. In addition Tesla Investment & Stocks allows withdrawals at any time within and at the end of the 30-day period. Finally, Tesla Investment & Stocks is integrated with the Bitcoin Blockchain network which means that withdrawals are just a click away from each person’s wallet. The fact that, at any time, anyone can make a withdrawal of balance implies that the deposited Bitcoins have to be available in the platform’s wallet in order to be transferred to user account.

 
4. How are the returns received?

The returns are credited daily in Bitcoins to the account of each user even on weekends and holidays.

5. Are returns paid daily?

Returns are calculated and distributed after each trading day. Our entire team of professionals have spent many hours developing the system and all our efforts are aimed at optimizing returns, but unfortunately it would not be correct to say that we achieve returns every day. Some days, fortunately they are few, the returns obtained may be negative and on that day there will be no distribution.

6. When does my investment start to yield earnings?

Depending on the time difference with each country and when the receipt of your deposit is confirmed, also receiving daily returns takes a period of 24hrs from Monday to Friday and during 48hrs over the weekend/holidays.

7. Is there a minimum amount to withdraw my returns?

Yes, in order to withdraw earnings, it is essential to have a minimum of $10 accumulated in your account balance.

8. If i withdraw balance from my account, do i receive it in Bitcoins?

Yes, earnings withdrawals are always made in bitcoins at the exchange rate of bitcoin at the time of the operation.

9. What is compound interest?

Compound interest is interest that produces interest, that is, interest in each period is added to the initial capital to produce new interest.

10. Are there risks involved?

We have been researching and developing our platform for a long time and although it is true that so far our results have been positive, operating in the crypto asset market involves a high level of risk. Although our committed team of experts and professionals work daily to obtain the best results, crypto assets and forex markets are always high risk markets. Whenever crypto assets are acquired, we must be aware of all the associated risks and keep in mind that high returns always imply taking higher risks and, of course, if anyone has any doubts, they should seek advice from an independent financial advisor.

11. What security is implemented in the accounts that open in Tesla Stocks Digital ?

All accounts opened in Tesla Investment & Stocks have the option to configure double authentication (2FA) for account access and for withdrawals. In addition, to avoid phishing (email is sent by someone impersonating Tesla Investment & Stocks ) all communications sent from Tesla Investment & Stocks incorporate a special phrase that the user must choose.

12. By being a Tesla Stocks Digital user, am i buying cryptocurrencies?

Yes, as a member of Tesla Investment & Stocks , you are participating in a system that seeks returns on different crypto assets and forex trading.

13. How does Tesla Stocks Digital operate?

We continuously monitor and analyze the crypto and forex market; evolution of the main crypto assets and their exchange rate in different currencies, and by means of advanced algorithms we find purchase/sale opportunities in real time. Depending on each moment in time, we can operate in several crypto assets simultaneously, in only some or in none. The value of our system lies in knowing which crypto assets, which currencies and at what time to buy or sell, and that information, obviously, cannot be made public.

14. Do you invest in Bitcoins?

Bitcoin is one of the crypto assets whose evolution we follow and analyze critically. As is the case with the rest of crypto assets, we can carry out operations with it depending on each moment in time.

15. Does Tesla Stocks Digital use blockchain technology?

Yes, the platform is integrated with the Bitcoin Blockchain network which facilitates a balance withdrawal/deposit request to be carried out automatically and instantly.

16. Can i recommend to my friends?

Yes of course. Furthermore, there is a referral program that offers advantages of (10%) for the person making the recommendation.

17. Can i register directly with Tesla Stocks Digital ?

Yes, you can become a member either by registering directly from our website or through referral link of a sponsor.

18. What happens to my investment after the 30-day period?

At the end of your contract, you’re eligible to withdraw both your capital and earnings or you could reinvest to automatically start a new cycle of investment.

19. Do i have to pay tax on the income obtained?

Yes, the income obtained must be declared according to the taxation laws governing your country of residence. Our recommendation is that if you have any questions, seek advice from an expert professional and always comply with the tax obligations of the country where you reside.

20. Is there any other type of commission charged?

Tesla Investment & Stocks does not charge management and maintenance expenses of the returns obtained. When making purchases or withdrawals, a small commission is charged but it is not for Tesla Investment & Stocks , but rather to cover the costs of the transfer of BTCs through the Blockchain network.

21. Do you have an App for Android or IPhone?

No, Tesla Investment & Stocks is adapted to access with any mobile device but no specific App for Android or iPhone has been developed yet. Any App that is advertised from the iPhone or Android stores does not belong to Tesla Investment & Stocks and therefore will not allow trading profits with Tesla Investment & Stocks accounts.

WE ARE THE BEST

Tesla Investment & Stocks has been giving best consultation to top Finance companies since 2012
